snippet: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Francesco Pianeta in the sixth round in Mannheim, Germany, to retain the World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation heavyweight titles.
abstract: Heavyweight champion Wladimir Klitschko stops Francesco Pianeta in sixth round in Mannheim, Germany, to retain World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation titles.
lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Francesco Pianeta in the sixth round in Mannheim, Germany, to retain the World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation heavyweight titles.
